p: NMR spectra were recorded on Varian Inova 400 and 500 NMR spectrometers (Palo Alto, CA, USA) ( 1H at 400 and 13C at 100, 1H at 500 MHz and 13C at 125 MHz, respectively), equipped with a SUN microsystem ultra 5 hardware. Coupling constants ( J values) are reported in Hertz (Hz), and chemical shifts (δ) in ppm, referred to CHD 2OD (δ H 3.31 and δ C 49.0). Spin multiplicities are given as s (singlet), br s (broad singlet), d (doublet), t (triplet) or m (multiplet). Through-space 1H connectivities were obtained using a ROESY experiment with mixing times of 150, 200 and 250 ms.
